allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Overhaul portfolio with modern glassmorphism design and updated content

Major Updates:
- Added new glassmorphism-themed portfolio \(index-glass.html\)
- Updated content to reflect current role as Data Scientist at ARGO Data
- Highlighted 4+ years of experience in ML/Computer Vision/Fraud Detection
- Showcased key achievements: 75% OCR performance boost, architectural redesigns, revenue-generating tools

Design Improvements:
- Modern dark theme with frosted glass effects and gradient backgrounds
- Animated gradient blobs with parallax scrolling
- Smooth hover effects and transitions
- Fully responsive design
- Enhanced readability with proper text alignment

Content Updates:
- Current role: Data Scientist I \(Jan 2023 - Present\)
- Previous role: Software Engineer \(Jan 2021 - Dec 2022\)
- Updated education section with completed MS in Computer Science \(2020\)
- Comprehensive skills categorization \(ML/AI, Computer Vision, Software Engineering, Data Science\)
- Updated location to Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, Texas

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
